title: Leader of a club, not in it.
body: My friend can see that I am leader of a club and still in it, yet I am not able to be in it? I can't get in the chat room or anything.

replies.body: This issue should be resolved now.  What's the name and club of your tag?  I'm happy to take a look!
I can see why you provided just the tag.  :P  Everything looks okay now, but I'd also reconsider the club name!  Let me know if the club issue still exists or you need help with _that_.
